00062 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_LEX_H
00063 #define CONSTRAINT_LEX_H
00064 
00065 template<typename VarArray1, typename VarArray2, BOOL Less = false>
00066 struct LexLeqConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00067 {
00068   virtual string constraint_name()
00069   { if(Less) return "LexLess"; else return "LexLeq"; }
00070   
00071   typedef LexLeqConstraint<VarArray2, VarArray1,!Less> NegConstraintType;
00072   typedef typename VarArray1::value_type ArrayVarRef1;
00073   typedef typename VarArray2::value_type ArrayVarRef2;
00074   
00075   ReversibleInt alpha;
00076   ReversibleInt beta;
00077   ReversibleInt F;
00078   
00079   VarArray1 x;
00080   VarArray2 y;
00081   
00082   LexLeqConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj,const VarArray1& _x, const VarArray2& _y) :
00083     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), alpha(_stateObj), beta(_stateObj), F(_stateObj), x(_x), y(_y)
00084   { D_ASSERT(x.size() == y.size()); }
00085   
00086   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00087   {
00088     triggerCollection t;
00089     
00090     int x_size = x.size();
00091     for(int i=0; i < x_size; ++i)
00092     {
00093       t.push_back(make_trigger(x[i], Trigger(this, i), LowerBound));
00094       t.push_back(make_trigger(x[i], Trigger(this, i), UpperBound));
00095     }
00096     
00097     int y_size = y.size();
00098     for(int i=0; i < y_size; ++i)
00099     {
00100       t.push_back(make_trigger(y[i], Trigger(this, i), LowerBound));
00101       t.push_back(make_trigger(y[i], Trigger(this, i), UpperBound));
00102     }
00103     alpha = 0;
00104     if(Less)
00105       beta = x_size;
00106     else
00107       beta = 100000;
00108     F = 0;
00109     return t;
00110   }
00111   
00112   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00113   {
00114     return new LexLeqConstraint<VarArray2, VarArray1,!Less>(stateObj,y,x);
00115   }
00116   
00117   void updateAlpha(int i) {
00118     int n = x.size();
00119     if(Less)
00120     {
00121       if(i == n || i == beta)
00122       {
00123         getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00124         return;
00125       }
00126       if (!x[i].isAssigned() || !y[i].isAssigned() ||
00127           x[i].getAssignedValue() != y[i].getAssignedValue())  {
00128         alpha = i;
00129         propagate(i,0);
00130       }
00131       else updateAlpha(i+1);
00132     }
00133     else
00134     {
00135       while (i < n) {
00136         if (!x[i].isAssigned() || !y[i].isAssigned() ||
00137             x[i].getAssignedValue() != y[i].getAssignedValue())  {
00138           alpha = i ;
00139           propagate(i,0) ;
00140           return ;
00141         }
00142         i++ ;
00143       }
00144       F = true ;
00145     }
00146     
00147   }
00148   
00150   // updateBeta()
00151   void updateBeta(int i) {
00152     int a = alpha ;
00153     while (i >= a) {
00154       if (x[i].getMin() < y[i].getMax()) {
00155         beta = i+1 ;
00156         if (!(x[i].getMax() < y[i].getMin())) propagate(i,0) ;
00157         return ;
00158       }
00159       i-- ;    
00160     }
00161     getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00162     
00163   }
00164   
00165   virtual void propagate(int i, DomainDelta)
00166   {
00167     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Lex);
00168     if (F)
00169     {
00170       return ;
00171     }
00172     int a = alpha, b = beta;
00173     
00174     //Not sure why we need this, but we seem to.
00175     if(b <= a)
00176     {
00177       getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00178       return;
00179     }
00180     
00181     if(Less)
00182     { if(i < a || i >=b) return; }
00183     else
00184     { if (i >= b) return ; }
00185     
00186     if (i == a && i+1 == b) {
00187       x[i].setMax(y[i].getMax()-1) ;
00188       y[i].setMin(x[i].getMin()+1) ;
00189       if (checkLex(i)) {
00190         F = true ;
00191         return ;
00192       }
00193     }
00194     else if (i == a && i+1 < b) {
00195       x[i].setMax(y[i].getMax()) ;
00196       y[i].setMin(x[i].getMin()) ;
00197       if (checkLex(i)) {
00198         F = true ;
00199         return ;
00200       }
00201       if (x[i].isAssigned() && y[i].isAssigned() && x[i].getAssignedValue() == y[i].getAssignedValue())
00202         updateAlpha(i+1) ;
00203     }
00204     else if (a < i && i < b) {
00205       if ((i == b-1 && x[i].getMin() == y[i].getMax()) || x[i].getMin() > y[i].getMax())
00206         updateBeta(i-1) ;
00207     }
00208   }
00209   
00210   virtual BOOL check_unsat(int unsat_val, DomainDelta)
00211   {
00212     int a = alpha;
00213     if(unsat_val >= a)
00214     {
00215       int x_size = x.size();
00216       for(int i = a; i < x_size; ++i)
00217       {
00218         DomainInt xval = x[i].getMin();
00219         DomainInt yval = y[i].getMax();
00220         if(xval < yval) 
00221         {
00222           alpha = i;
00223           return false;
00224         }
00225         if(xval > yval)
00226           return true;
00227       }
00228       if(Less)
00229         return true;
00230       else
00231       {
00232         alpha = x.size();
00233         return false;
00234       }
00235       
00236     }
00237     else
00238     {
00239       DomainInt xval = x[unsat_val].getMin();
00240       DomainInt yval = y[unsat_val].getMax();
00241       if (xval > yval)
00242         return true;
00243       else
00244         return false;
00245     }
00246     FAIL_EXIT();
00247   }
00248   
00249   virtual BOOL full_check_unsat()
00250   {
00251     alpha = 0;
00252     return check_unsat(0, 0);
00253   }
00254   
00255   BOOL checkLex(int i) {
00256     if(Less)
00257     {
00258       return x[i].getMax() < y[i].getMin();
00259     }
00260     else
00261     {
00262       int n = x.size() ;
00263       if (i == n-1) return (x[i].getMax() <= y[i].getMin()) ;
00264       else return (x[i].getMax() < y[i].getMin());
00265     }
00266   }
00267   
00268   virtual void full_propagate()
00269   {
00270     int i, n = x.size() ;
00271     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00272       if (!x[i].isAssigned()) break ;    
00273       if (!y[i].isAssigned()) break ;
00274       if (x[i].getAssignedValue() != y[i].getAssignedValue()) break ;
00275     }
00276     if (i < n) {
00277       alpha = i ;
00278       if (checkLex(i)) {
00279         F = true ;
00280         return ;
00281       }
00282       int betaBound = -1 ;
00283       for (; i < n; i++) {
00284         if (x[i].getMin() > y[i].getMax()) break ;
00285         if (x[i].getMin() == y[i].getMax()) {
00286           if (betaBound == -1) betaBound = i ;     
00287         }
00288         else betaBound = -1 ;
00289       }
00290       if(!Less)
00291       {
00292         if (i == n) beta = 1000000 ;
00293         else if (betaBound == -1) beta = i ;
00294         else beta = betaBound ;
00295       }
00296       else
00297       {
00298         if(i == n) beta = n;
00299         if (betaBound == -1) beta = i ;
00300         else beta = betaBound ;
00301       }
00302       if (alpha >= beta) getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00303       propagate(alpha,0) ;             //initial propagation, if necessary.
00304     }
00305     else 
00306     {
00307       if(Less)
00308         getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00309       else
00310         F = true;
00311     }
00312   }
00313   
00314   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00315   {
00316     D_ASSERT(v_size == x.size() + y.size());
00317     size_t x_size = x.size();
00318 
00319     for(size_t i = 0;i < x_size; i++)
00320     {
00321       if(v[i] < v[i + x_size])
00322         return true;
00323       if(v[i] > v[i + x_size])
00324         return false;
00325     }
00326     if(Less)
00327       return false;
00328     else
00329       return true;
00330   }
00331   
00332   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00333   {
00334     size_t x_size = x.size();
00335     for(size_t i = 0; i < x_size; ++i)
00336     {
00337       DomainInt x_i_min = x[i].getMin();
00338       DomainInt y_i_max = y[i].getMax();
00339       
00340       if(x_i_min > y_i_max)
00341       {
00342         return false;
00343       }
00344       
00345       assignment.push_back(make_pair(i         , x_i_min));
00346       assignment.push_back(make_pair(i + x_size, y_i_max));
00347       if(x_i_min < y_i_max)
00348         return true;
00349     }
00350     
00351     if(Less)
00352       return false;
00353     return true;
00354   }
00355   
00356   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00357   { 
00358     vector<AnyVarRef> array_copy;
00359     for(unsigned int i=0;i<x.size();i++)
00360       array_copy.push_back(AnyVarRef(x[i]));
00361     
00362     for(unsigned int i=0;i<y.size();i++)
00363       array_copy.push_back(AnyVarRef(y[i]));
00364     return array_copy;
00365   }
00366 };

00368 
00369 template<typename VarArray1, typename VarArray2>
00370 AbstractConstraint*
00371 BuildCT_LEXLEQ(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray1& x, const VarArray2& y, ConstraintBlob&)
00372 { return new LexLeqConstraint<VarArray1, VarArray2>(stateObj,x,y); }
00373 
00374 template<typename VarArray1, typename VarArray2>
00375 AbstractConstraint*
00376 BuildCT_LEXLESS(StateObj* stateObj,const VarArray1& x, const VarArray2& y, ConstraintBlob&)
00377 { return new LexLeqConstraint<VarArray1, VarArray2,true>(stateObj, x,y); }
